name: Tiles Puzzle HD
description:
Tile Puzzle with graphics in HD quality, amazing to play on the iPad HD.

Universal App buy one and you get the Version for iPhone, iPod and iPad.

**************************************
Features:
- For iPad, iPad HD, iPhone and iPod touch
- Three different size 9,16 and 25 for each theme
- 6 graphical themes in HD quality
- 3 numeric themes in HD quality
- Available in English, French, German and Spanish
